mapper.insert: insert into sea_co_data (v_id, tid, tname, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_spic, v_gpic, v_hit, v_money, v_rank, v_digg, v_tread, v_commend, v_wrong, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_actor, v_color, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_topic, v_note, v_tags, v_letter, v_from, v_inbase, v_des, v_playdata, v_downdata ) values (#{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{tname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vSpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vGpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vMoney,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vRank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vDigg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vTread,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vCommend,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vWrong,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vColor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vPublishyear,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vPublisharea,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vTopic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vTags,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vFrom,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vInbase,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vDes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{vPlaydata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{vDowndata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sea_co_data set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, tname = #{tname,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_name = #{vName,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_state = #{vState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_pic = #{vPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_spic = #{vSpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_gpic = #{vGpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_hit = #{vHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_money = #{vMoney,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_rank = #{vRank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_digg = #{vDigg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_tread = #{vTread,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_commend = #{vCommend,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_wrong = #{vWrong,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_director = #{vDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_enname = #{vEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_lang = #{vLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_actor = #{vActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_color = #{vColor,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_publishyear = #{vPublishyear,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_publisharea = #{vPublisharea,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_addtime = #{vAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_topic = #{vTopic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_note = #{vNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_tags = #{vTags,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_letter = #{vLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_from = #{vFrom,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_inbase = #{vInbase,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_des = #{vDes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, v_playdata = #{vPlaydata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, v_downdata = #{vDowndata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where v_id = #{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select v_id, tid, tname, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_spic, v_gpic, v_hit, v_money, v_rank, v_digg, v_tread, v_commend, v_wrong, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_actor, v_color, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_topic, v_note, v_tags, v_letter, v_from, v_inbase, v_des, v_playdata, v_downdata from sea_co_data where v_id = #{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
